page.title: 12SALTHOLME FARM 2
page.content: All the meat from the farm is sold direct to the abbatoir rather than go to auction.This is to provide the manager with direct information as to the quality of the meat and his sudsequent alterations in feeding needed to preserve the quality. Togther with the cattle an increasing number of acres is given over to the growing of{winter wheat}and{oil seed {rape,}which,as well as being a cashcrop,is also excellent for "clearing"the land instead of letting it lie fallow in the rotation system. The farm{employs}8 full time men and 2 seasonal workers. Pipe lines and pylons run across the land resulting in a very industrial and ugly outlook though the farm is reasonably prosperous.
